title: Manchester City vs Wolves - Premier League 2019/20: Live score and updates
text:
Manchester City know they must win to keep within touching distance of early pace-setters Liverpool after the Reds' last-gasp win over Leicester City on Saturday.

Pep Guardiola's defending champions take on a Wolves side buoyed by their dramatic late win over Besiktas in the Europa League on Thursday night.

Nuno Espirito Santo's side will be well aware that City's last home game in the league saw them stick eight past Watford and he will be determined not to be beaten in similar fashion on Sunday afternoon.

Follow all the action as it happens at the Etihad Stadium right here with Sportsmail's OLLIE LEWIS.
description: Manchester City know they must win to keep within touching distance of early pace-setters Liverpool after the Reds' last-gasp win over Leicester City on Saturday. Follow all the action with OLLIE LEWIS.
